#include<stdio.h>

long long gcd(long long p, long long q)
{
    if(p==q || p==0)
        return q;
    else if (q==0)
        return p;
    else if(p>q)
        return gcd(q,p%q);
    else
        return  gcd(p,q%p);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long p,q,r;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&p,&q);
        r=gcd(p,q);
        p=p/r;
        q=q/r;
        if(p==1)
        {
            if(q&(q-1)==0)
                printf("YES\n");
            else
            {
                while(q%2==0)
                {
                    q=q>>1;
                }
                if(((q+1)&q)==0)
                    printf("YES\n");
                else
                    printf("NO\n");
            }

        }
        else if(p<=q+1 && (p&(p-1))==0 && ((q+1)&q)==0  )
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");

    }
    return 0;
}
